title: Bug 6410: File remains dirtied by code assist even though no changes are made
description: Bug 6410: Although no changes are made to the file, it remains dirtied by code assist
OB: When code assist does not have any suggestions, the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes are made, and code assist does not appear.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirtied.
